name: Get to Know the Greek Gods
name_original: Get to Know the Greek Gods
description:
A short quiz game about the objects, plants, and animals associated with the Twelve Olympians (as well as Hades and Hestia).  

Some questions may have more than one correct answer, and each answer could be used more than once.

Built in Twine 2 originally for the Greek Mytholojam 2018 and finished for the Finally Finish Something 2019 Jam.
